CMenu

CMenu represents a menu which can contain other menus and CMenu.CMenuItem

Summary
CMenuCMenu represents a menu which can contain other menus and CMenu.CMenuItem
Functions
__NewCreates a new Menu object.
AddSubMenuAdds a submenu to this menu.
AddMenuItemAdds a menu item to this menu.
AddSeparatorAdds a separator to the menu
DeleteMenuItemDeletes a menu item from the menu.
DisposeMenu()Disposes the menu so that it can be deleted and its resources are freed.
ShowShows the menu.
SetIconSets the icon of this menu item.
Properties
TextThe text under which this menu appears as a submenu in another menu.
EnabledSets whether this submenu is enabled/disabled.
CheckedSets whether this submenu has a checkmark.
DefaultSets whether this submenu is rendered with bold font.
IconThe path to the icon of the menu item.
IconNumberThe number of the menu item icon in a grouped icon file.
IconWidthThe width of an icon (>0), a resource identifier (<0) or the actual size of the icon (=0).
CMenu.CMenuItemA menu item in a CMenu.
Functions
SetIconSets the icon of this menu item.
Properties
TextThe text of this menu item.
EnabledSets whether this menu item is enabled/disabled.
CheckedSets whether this menu item has a checkmark.
DefaultSets whether this menu item is rendered with bold font.
IconThe path to the icon of the menu item.
IconNumberThe number of the menu item icon in a grouped icon file.
IconWidthThe width of an icon (>0), a resource identifier (<0) or the actual size of the icon (=0).

Functions

__New

Creates a new Menu object.  Name must be unique through the whole application.

AddSubMenu

Adds a submenu to this menu.

Parameters

TextThe name under which the submenu will appear in this menu
NameOrMenuObjectEither the name of a new menu or an existing CMenu instance.

AddMenuItem

Adds a menu item to this menu.  The menu item object is CMenu.CMenuItem

Parameters

TextThe text of the menu item in this menu.
CallbackA function that will be called when the menu item is clicked.  This function is usually located within a derived class of CGUI.  If the Menu is shown through CGUI.ShowMenu() or added as menu bar to a window this parameter can simply be the name of the function contained in the derived class of CGUI.

AddSeparator

Adds a separator to the menu

DeleteMenuItem

Deletes a menu item from the menu.  ObjectIndexOrName can either be a menu/submenu object, the index of the item in this menu or its name.  If ObjectIndexOrName is a menu item, it will be disposed.  If it is a submenu, it will not be disposed so it can be reused elsewhere.

Returns: The deleted menu item

DisposeMenu()

Disposes the menu so that it can be deleted and its resources are freed.  After calling this function the menu won’t be usable anymore.

Show

Shows the menu.  For most cases, this function is not called directly.  Instead, use CGUI.ShowMenu.

Parameters

GUINumThe GUI number of the window owning this menu.  This is required if the callback functions are contained in a class deriving from CGUI.  Leave it empty to use global callback functions
XX position of the menu.
YY position of the menu.

SetIcon

Sets the icon of this menu item.

Parameters

IconThe path to the icon file.
IconNumberThe number of the icon in a group
IconWidthThe width of an icon (>0), a resource identifier (<0) or the actual size of the icon (=0).  Use the latter if you have transparency issues.

Properties

Text

The text under which this menu appears as a submenu in another menu.

Enabled

Sets whether this submenu is enabled/disabled.

Checked

Sets whether this submenu has a checkmark.

Default

Sets whether this submenu is rendered with bold font.

Icon

The path to the icon of the menu item.

IconNumber

The number of the menu item icon in a grouped icon file.

IconWidth

The width of an icon (>0), a resource identifier (<0) or the actual size of the icon (=0).  Use the latter if you have transparency issues.

CMenu.CMenuItem

A menu item in a CMenu.  This class is not instantiated directly.  Instead, use CMenu.AddMenuItem.

Summary
Functions
SetIconSets the icon of this menu item.
Properties
TextThe text of this menu item.
EnabledSets whether this menu item is enabled/disabled.
CheckedSets whether this menu item has a checkmark.
DefaultSets whether this menu item is rendered with bold font.
IconThe path to the icon of the menu item.
IconNumberThe number of the menu item icon in a grouped icon file.
IconWidthThe width of an icon (>0), a resource identifier (<0) or the actual size of the icon (=0).

Functions

SetIcon

Sets the icon of this menu item.

Parameters

IconThe path to the icon file.
IconNumberThe number of the icon in a group
IconWidthThe width of an icon (>0), a resource identifier (<0) or the actual size of the icon (=0).  Use the latter if you have transparency issues.

Properties

Text

The text of this menu item.

Enabled

Sets whether this menu item is enabled/disabled.

Checked

Sets whether this menu item has a checkmark.

Default

Sets whether this menu item is rendered with bold font.

Icon

The path to the icon of the menu item.

IconNumber

The number of the menu item icon in a grouped icon file.

IconWidth

The width of an icon (>0), a resource identifier (<0) or the actual size of the icon (=0).  Use the latter if you have transparency issues.

A menu item in a CMenu.
CMenu represents a menu which can contain other menus and CMenu.CMenuItem
Shows a menu.
Adds a menu item to this menu.
